How to treat combined respiratory and
metabolic acidosis after extracorporeal
cardiopulmonary resuscitation?
Xavier Bemtgen 1* , Florentine Schroth 1 , Tobias Wengenmayer 1 , Paul M. Biever 1 , Daniel Duerschmied 1 ,
Christoph Benk 2 , Christoph Bode 1 and Dawid L. Staudacher 1
This comment refers to the article available at https://doi.org/10.1186/cc9976
Keywords: VA-ECMO, eCPR, Survival, Carbon dioxide, paCO 2 , pH
